anarchist.name: Anarchist
anarchist.description:
Welcome to Viva La Revolución. You are an Anarchist.

Abilities:
- Plant: Every night, you may plant a bomb on a player. The bomb will explode two nights later, inclusive of the night in which it was planted.
- 1-shot Invincibility: You are immune to a single attack.

Win Condition: You win when you are the last player alive.

arsonist.name: Arsonist
arsonist.description:
Welcome to Viva La Revolución. You are an Arsonist.

Abilities:
- Douse: Every night, you may douse a player in gasoline.
- Ignite: Every night, instead of dousing, you may choose to ignite, dealing an attack to all doused players.
- 1-shot Invincibility: You are immune to a single attack.

Win Condition: You win when you are the last player alive.

mafia_vigilante.name: Mafia Vigilante
mafia_vigilante.description:
Welcome to Viva La Revolución. You are a Mafia Vigilante.

Abilities:
- Shoot: Every night, you may shoot a player
- 1-shot Invincibility: You are immune to a single attack.

Win Condition: You win when you are the last player alive.

vanilla_townie.name: Vanilla Townie
vanilla_townie.description:
Welcome to Viva La Revolución. You are a Vanilla Townie.

Abilities:
- Vote: You have no abilities other than your vote.

Win condition: Eliminate all threats to the Town.

bulletproof_bomb_defuser.name: Bomb Defuser
bulletproof_bomb_defuser.description:
Welcome to Viva La Revolución. You are a Mafia Vigilante.

Abilities:
- Shoot: Every night, you may shoot a player
- 1-shot Invincibility: You are immune to a single attack.

Win Condition: You win when you are the last player alive.

bombproof_bomb_defuser.name: Bomb Defuser
bombproof_bomb_defuser.description:
Welcome to Viva La Revolución. You are a Bomb Defuser.

Abilities:
- Defuse: Every night, you may visit a player to defuse a bomb.
- Bomb-proof: You cannot be killed by a bomb yourself.

Win condition: Eliminate all threats to the Town.

bulletproof_doctor.name: Doctor
bulletproof_doctor.description:
Welcome to Viva La Revolución. You are a Doctor.

Abilities:
- Protect: Every night, you may protect a player to prevent them from being killed by a gun.
- Bulletproof: You cannot be killed by a bullet yourself.

Win condition: Eliminate all threats to the Town.

fireproof_firefighter.name: Firefighter
fireproof_firefighter.description:
Welcome to Viva La Revolución. You are a Firefighter.

Abilities:
- Extinguish: Every night, you may visit a player to remove gasoline from them.
- Fireproof: You cannot be killed by an arsonist's fire yourself.

Win condition: Eliminate all threats to the Town.

tracker.name: Tracker
tracker.description:
Welcome to Viva La Revolución. You are a Tracker.

Abilities:
- Track: Every night, you may track a player to see who they visited.

Win condition: Eliminate all threats to the Town.
